instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A219, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Generalized Reynolds equation; thermal, turbulent, inertia, fluid compressibility, and surface roughness effects in sliding bearings; fatigue, scuffing, and wear in elastohydrodynamic contact; plastohydrodynamic lubrication in metal rolling, extrusion, and forging.
